fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.cps

Class DistributedCVM

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM
        • fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.cps.DistributedCVM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentVirtualMachineI, DistributedComponentVirtualMachineI

    public class DistributedCVM
extends AbstractDistributedCVM
    The class DistributedCVM deploys and executes the continuation-passing style example on a single JVM.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2018-03-19

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
